message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $11,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this price is more in line with the value I can get from the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't sell it for less than $10,500. It's still a significant discount considering the value you'll gain.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,500. I'd like to meet you in the middle, so I'm willing to offer $10,000. Can you consider this price?
